thread.title: Great boutique hotel in perfect location!
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel in perfect location! - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kara M
title: Great boutique hotel in perfect location!
text:
I stay at hotel 3232 every time I am in New York for work. It is a perfect location, clean and beautiful! Great boutique hotel, staff is amazing, and breakfast was included. I highly recommend this if you need a central, affordable nice place to stay!
Room Tip: Most rooms come with 1 queen bed, but they have some doubles available. See more room tips
